item.title: Manatee County launches new web tool ahead of trash pickup changes
item.description: Beginning Oct. 6, a new solid waste collection schedule will take effect.

item.title: Seffner high school teacher charged with showing porn to former students
item.description: The material included images of bestiality and child pornography, authorities said.

item.title: Summer heat continues, rain chances higher this weekend
item.description: Heat indices will again climb into the triple digits on Thursday.

item.title: Veterans in Manatee County to get free access to legal aid
item.description: These clinics will provide advice on issues such as housing, benefits, family law and more.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Waco twins rescued from Hill Country flooding speak for first time
item.description: Clara and Nolan Shelton are speaking in detail for the first time about the nightmare that unfolded in Kerr County.

item.title: Tampa Bay Buccaneers star left tackle Tristan Wirfs set to miss start of the 2025 season
item.description: Tristan Wirfs is expected to miss the start of the regular season because of a knee injury.

item.title: Lido Beach to undergo renourishment project starting later this year
item.description: The project will restore 1.2 miles of eroded shoreline.

item.title: Local semi-pro soccer team Sarasota Paradise clinch playoff berth
item.description: The Sarasota Paradise are coming off of a victory that saw them score 16 goals and not give up any. The win also clinched a postseason berth this year’s team.

item.title: ‘Angry and embarrassed’ parents turn in Riverwalk vandals to police
item.description: If you recognize either individual, please contact police.
